description:
While pushing its tired narrative about Biden “losing patience," the White House remains dedicated to Israel’s war on Gaza.

The post With Netanyahu Threatening Rafah Invasion, Biden Prepares to Send Israel More Bombs appeared first on The Intercept.
title: With Netanyahu Threatening Rafah Invasion, Biden Prepares to Send Israel More Bombs

description:
Gen. Prabowo Subianto, who has been implicated in some of the country’s worst massacres, will soon be president of Indonesia.

The post “America’s Fair-Haired Boy,” Notorious Mass Murderer, on Brink of Indonesian Presidency appeared first on The Intercept.
title: “America’s Fair-Haired Boy,” Notorious Mass Murderer, on Brink of Indonesian Presidency
